q: The singer, who is a good friend of show boss Simon Cowell , said that he would be happy to take a judging or mentoring role on the new series. He told the Daily Mail: Simon Cowell and I have talked about doing things together and I always try to be supportive of people who are friends of mine. Simon Cowell previously described Usher as a`` great mentor'' but questioned whether he could afford enough time to the programme.

Andy Coulson one degree of separation to the McCann affair: McCann family spokesman Clarence Mitchell joins CCHQ as head of media monitoring for the election www.prweek.com PR Week has the story: The Conservative Party has signed up Clarence Mitchell , best-known as spokesman for Madeleine McCann's parents, as the head of media monitoring for its general election campaign, PRWeek can exclusively reveal.`` Clarence Mitchell joins the Tory comms operation today, reporting directly to Art Director of communications Andy Coulson . Clarence Mitchell , who was the Art Director of the Government's media monitoring unit for two years( 2005-2007) will take a back room role, monitoring the progress of the Tories' campaign in the media. At a dinner this week, attended by`` The Daily Telegraph'', with conservatives in New York, Donald Rumsfeld elicited murmurs of approval when he suggested that Barack Obama 's troop-heavy strategy in Afghanistan was flawed. I personally did not think we needed to make a Korea out of Afghanistan, he said.`` The Soviets were in there with hundreds of thousands of troops for 12 years and lost. It's a landlocked country, it went through occupation, civil war, drought, hostile neighbours.

shake-up. Current Google CEO Eric Schmidt will serve as the company's executive chairman. Co-founder Sergey Brin will devote his time to strategic projects, in particular working on new products, the company said. We've been talking about how best to simplify our management structure and speed up decision making for a long time, Eric Schmidt said in a statement.`` By clarifying our individual roles we'll create clearer responsibility and accountability at the top of the company.
